sqlMap.select: select order_id,cp_id,refund_seq,CONVERT(refund_money, CHAR) AS refund_money,user_remark,refund_percent,channel,refund_type,refund_status from mt_orderinfo_refundstream where (refund_status='00' or refund_status='01') and (refund_type='11' or refund_type='55') order by create_time limit 0,50

SELECT hc.order_id, hc.train_no, hc.from_city, hc.to_city, CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(hc.from_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), CHAR) from_time, CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(hc.from_time,'%Y-%m-%d'), CHAR) travel_time, hc.out_ticket_billno, CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(hc.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), CHAR) out_ticket_time, cp.cp_id, CONVERT(cp.buy_money, CHAR) buy_money, CONVERT(cp.refund_12306_money, CHAR) refund_12306_money, cp.user_name, CONVERT(cp.ticket_type, CHAR) ticket_type, CONVERT(cp.ids_type, CHAR)ids_type, cp.user_ids, CONVERT(cp.seat_type, CHAR) seat_type, cp.train_box, cp.seat_no FROM mt_orderinfo hc LEFT JOIN mt_orderinfo_cp cp ON hc.order_id=cp.order_id WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# and cp.cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR#
SELECT a.acc_username, a.acc_password ,a.acc_id FROM cp_accountinfo a LEFT JOIN cp_orderinfo cp ON a.acc_id=cp.account_id WHERE cp.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

and refund_status=#old_refund_status#
UPDATE mt_orderinfo_cp SET alter_money=#alter_tickets_money# WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# and cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR#

detail_refund=#actual_refund_money#

sqlMap.select: select changeInfo.order_id,changeInfo.change_train_no train_no,changeInfo.from_city, changeInfo.to_city,CONVERT(changeInfo.change_from_time, CHAR) from_time, CONVERT(changeInfo.change_travel_time, CHAR) travel_time,changeInfo.out_ticket_billno, CONVERT(changeInfo.option_time, CHAR) out_ticket_time, cp.new_cp_id cp_id,CONVERT(cp.change_buy_money, CHAR) buy_money, cp.user_name,cp.ticket_type,cp.ids_type,cp.user_ids,cp.change_seat_type seat_type,cp.change_train_box train_box, cp.change_seat_no seat_no from elong_orderinfo_change changeInfo,elong_change_cp cp,mt_orderinfo hc where changeInfo.change_id=cp.change_id and hc.order_id=changeInfo.order_id and changeInfo.order_id=#order_id# and cp.new_cp_id=#cp_id#
